snippet: A 57S sedan made a dutiful appearance at Cobo Center in the shadow of its Daimler sibling, Mercedes-Benz. The Maybach brand is scheduled to be phased out in 2013.
abstract: A 57S sedan made a dutiful appearance at Cobo Center in the shadow of its Daimler sibling, Mercedes-Benz. The Maybach brand is scheduled to be phased out in 2013.
lead_paragraph: Of unlikely sights at Cobo Center, a dedicated nook for the doomed Maybach brand would rank high. The Maybach 57S made an obliging appearance next to the sprawling stand of its Daimler sibling, Mercedes-Benz, where hundreds of journalists crowded in for the formal introduction of the Mercedes SL550 roadster (and who lingered afterward for steak tips).

headline.main: The Maybach, Conspicuous by Its Presence
